description: This Fundamentals course could just as easily be called "Middle school math". It's the course you should take before starting the Algebra series, which will take you from Pre-algebra through Algebra I and II. In order to be prepared for Pre-algebra, you'll need a solid understanding of the basic math concepts taught in this Fundamentals course. More than 50 videos are included. Many topics include course notes and practice questions with full solutions.
title: Master the Fundamentals of Math
